page.title: 06ACCESS TO COMPUTERS
page.content:
Our{school}has a{B.B.C."B"}with a disk drive for all of the children to use.It is used in each classroom on different days. The number of children in our class who have access to a home computer is {16 out of 25.}Nine people don't have computers at home. Out of these 14 have a tape deck with theirs and 2 have a disk drive. Out of the 4 teaching staff nobody owns a computer. {THE COMPUTERS WHICH WE OWN
{Acorn B.B.C "B" }2 {Commodore 64 }3 {Sinclair ZX81 }2 {Sinclair ZX Spectrum }3 {Tandy }4 {Amstrad }1 {Vic 20 }1
